ComicInfo.Title: The Cobra's Venom Part 4
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Cobra's Venom Part 4: The Joes transport Sightline back to the Pit, but his wounded leg is amputated during surgery. Grateful to the Joes for helping him, Doctor Mindbender secretly delivers a prosthetic leg to the Joes. In Shazidar, Cover Girl leads a Joe team to rescue UN relief workers from a terrorist army called Green Morning. Meanwhile, Destro has launched a hostile takeover of Revanche by eliminating all of their known bases simultaneously; the queen of the Blue Ninjas orders her followers to attack the Arashikage.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 08:45:23. [CVDB699934] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:13. [Issue ID 1921389]
